name: Xion Cleak
description:
Xion Cleak is an Incremental Game from Xion Leak, a 2D Cooperation Platformer where 2 robots have to escape from a laboratory.

Controls

  • Click on the Xion to gather xion currency
  • Move your robot by using arrows keys
  • Collect Gears and Golden gears to upgrade your buildings
  • Avoid ice blocks !

Arts (Music and Pixelart) made by BabaDesBois

BabaDesBois is a french Developer, Pixel Artist and Sound Designer who is also my teammate for the development of our game Xion Leak.

Check him out on his social networks :

  • Twitter https://twitter.com/BabaDesBois
  • Twitch https://www.twitch.tv/babadesbois
  • Kofi https://ko-fi.com/babadesbois
  • Website https://babadesbois.com/

You can also check out our game here : https://twitter.com/XionLeak which will be released around early 2022 on Steam ! (no steam page yet)
